# Edition.mintAdditionalSupplyTo property

Increase the supply of an existing NFT and mint it to a given wallet address

**Signature:**

```typescript
mintAdditionalSupplyTo: {
        (receiver: string, tokenId: import("ethers").BigNumberish, additionalSupply: import("ethers").BigNumberish): Promise<import("../../core/types").TransactionResultWithId<NFT>>;
        prepare: (receiver: string, tokenId: import("ethers").BigNumberish, additionalSupply: import("ethers").BigNumberish) => Promise<import("../..").Transaction<import("../../core/types").TransactionResultWithId<NFT>>>;
    };
```
